name: LiveGuardSetStatus
description:
This service overrides the operational flags for a liveguard instance.

This should never be used in production environments. This is used to mimick offline scenario's in liveguard deployments in the cloud.

properties.name: DisableCheckTask
properties.description: Disable the automatic task that checks for Internet/EVACloud. This should be set to true if these properties need to be managed by hand.

properties.name: EVACloudAvailable
properties.description: Flag this environment as if the cloud deployment of EVA is not availabled. Will disable a lot of functionality.

properties.name: InternetAvailable
properties.description: Flag this environment as if it has no working internet connection. Will disable a lot of functionality.

properties.name: RunningOnWatchtower
properties.description: Flag this environment as if it's running on a watchtower device. Will disable a lot of functionality.
